verses.roman:
vāra-māsa tāhā prabhu karena aṅgīkāra
'rāghavera jhāli' bali' prasiddhi yāhāra

synonyms: vāra-māsa—the whole year; tāhā—all those foods; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena—did; aṅgīkāra—accept; rāghavera jhāli—the bags of Rāghava Paṇḍita; bali'-so called; prasiddhi—celebrated; yāhāra—of which.
translation: The Lord accepted these foods throughout the entire year. Those bags are still celebrated as rāghavera jhāli ["the bags of Rāghava Paṇḍita"].
